# App0Jfxx.ThumbnailImage3bppRgb.ThumbnailRgbData property

The RGB data for the thumbnail.

```csharp
public byte[] ThumbnailRgbData { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Each pixel is 3-bytes (RGB) and the data is stored in row-major order.
